sentence.Network_en: He proposed that the present continents once comprised one large landmass which he named Pangaea.
sentence.Network_cn: 他提出目前的大陆以前是连在一起的一个巨大陆块,他把这个陆块称为联合古陆.

sentence.Network_en: It's the start of my night watch on Pangaea.
sentence.Network_cn: 今晚轮到我值班看守帆船.

sentence.Network_en: Tonight we will find a to moor Pangaea and our team will have a good sleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 今晚,我们将找个地儿抛锚停航而我们的团队也将好好睡一觉.

encyclopedia.content: 游戏简介 韩国游戏开发公司PANGAEA旗下开发的成人MMORPG《PANGAEA》，以战争为题材、赌博中心等游戏为主的迷你游戏模式。为了进入到迷你游戏模式，玩家必须得先在战斗模式里的商店购买迷你游戏入场券。 游戏特点 第一，拍卖系统 游戏中的拍卖系统支持玩家使用游戏币通过竞拍的方式购买现实中的商品。拍卖系统将天天运营，并不断推出新商品供玩家竞拍。首次竞拍中最引人注目的商品为钻戒。 第二，任何角色可以使用刀、枪、魔法 《P

means.word_mean: 1. (plate tectonics) a hypothetical continent including all the landmass of the earth prior to the Triassic period when it split into Laurasia and Gondwanaland

auth_sentence.content: The continents then were assembled into the Supercontinent Pangaea.
auth_sentence.res_content: The continents then were assembled into the Supercontinent Pangaea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The continents then were assembled into the Supercontinent Pangaea.

auth_sentence.content: The single global ocean which surrounded Pangaea is accordingly named Panthalassa.
auth_sentence.res_content: The single global ocean which surrounded Pangaea is accordingly named Panthalassa.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The single global ocean which surrounded Pangaea is accordingly named Panthalassa.

auth_sentence.content: Of course, that s only the bug-eyes on the west side of Pangaea; those of east have a totally different mythology.
